text: Nicolás Filiberti, 2010 Nicolás Filiberti (born April 11, 1977 in Buenos Aires) is an Argentine racing driver.http://www.oldracingcars.com/driver/Nicolas_Filiberti He has competed in different series, with major success in Argentine TRV6 and TC2000.http://www.racecam.de/index.php?lang=en&site;=fahrer&id;=798&sid;=27&print;=1& ==References== ==External links== *http://www.life.com/image/1188031 *http://www.race-database.com/driver/career.php?driver_id=nfili1 *http://www.driverdb.com/drivers/482/ Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine racing drivers Category:International Formula 3000 drivers Category:TC 2000 Championship drivers Category:American Le Mans Series drivers Category:Top Race V6 drivers Category:Formula 3 Sudamericana drivers Category:Porsche Supercup drivers
title: Nicolás Filiberti
